page.title: 04POLICE STATION
page.content: The Market Deeping police station is a modern building adjacent to the Health Centre and library.There are 17 policemen in the Deepings area from Deeping St.Nicholas to the A.1.near Stamford.In the station are the sergeant's office, enquiry office and lots of other rooms. Most of the time is spent doing paper work and not much time outside.Most of the crime in Deeping involves drunkenness and damage to property.About 50% of crime is caused by young school leavers.The police officer that works in Deeping St.James hardly ever works after 1.00 a.m.The police often visit local schools to talk about road safety and cycling proficiency.The transport that is provided is one police car that covers all of Deeping .The rest ofthe policemen go on foot.
